summary: This document appears to be a set of resolutions from a Limited Liability Company (LLC) regarding the management and operation of bank accounts held by the company. It includes authorizations for specific individuals to act on behalf of the company in financial matters, particularly in relation to Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. The document highlights the roles of various authorized signers and outlines the powers granted to them.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an authorized signer for the LLC, indicating his role in managing the company's financial accounts.

persons.name: Darren Indyko
persons.context: Darren Indyko is mentioned as another authorized signer for the LLC, allowing him to act on behalf of the company.

persons.name: Karen L. Conlon
persons.context: Karen L. Conlon is also listed as an authorized signer for the LLC, indicating her involvement in the company's financial decisions.
